column5: Notes

Traveling with lift pass: Not valid between Mezzaselva and Kublis. Traveling with guest card:  Not valid between Mezzaselva and Kublis;  unless staying in Saas and guest card is marked with an S. In which case not valid for travel between Saas and Kublis. Monday to Saturday only - no service on public holidays
